alert.note: Alert for Frontier; Lincoln (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 31 at 3:58PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Frontier and southeastern Lincoln Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 358 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Brady to 8 miles northeast of Wellfleet. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Moorefield, Vroman and Jeffrey Canyon State Wildlife Management Area. This includes Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 202 and 208. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
